cards.flavor:
"The economy of three worlds is sustained by He3 extraction from the lunar surface. The very fulcrum of power, the key to collective survival—auctioned to the highest bidder."
—The Catalyst
cards.stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 15 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 3 credits from this asset.

cards.flavor: "It's worse than dead meat—your project is too toxic to even feed to the vultures! If you don't want to join it in the bloody memory hole, crawl onto every business show you can and wallow in blame like a pig in muck."
cards.stripped_text: When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards. Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.

cards.flavor:
The self-evolving Net twists into spaces unthought and unthinkable: realms of gods and other infohazards, mocking our sacrifices to petty causality.
—Conceptual Frameworks for Applied Theology
cards.stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2 credits and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
